Package com.golden.gamedev.object.font

Game font implementation.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AdvanceBitmapFont Game font that use images for the letter, each images can have different width but must have same height.
BitmapFont Game font that use images for the letter, all the images must have equal dimension (same width and height).
SystemFont SystemFont is standard AWT Font wrapped in game font interface to be able to draw AWT Font in alignment and other technique.
 

Package com.golden.gamedev.object.font Description

Game font implementation.

See Also:
GameFont, GameFontManager
